name: Mineforge VR
description:
Mineforge VR is the world's first FULLY PLAYABLE virtual reality block based mining game for Google Cardboard and other VR headsets! This is not a demo, this is a fully working free game.

Mineforge is a free block based world-building, crafting and exploration virtual reality game.

Some of Mineforge's features:

• Mine deep into the planet's surface
• Craft your own buildings and structures
• Creative mode gameplay
• Infinite seeded terrain generation
• Varying biomes
• Day-night cycle
• Gamepad support
• All in VR
• Completely FREE game!
